htoyama.githaru.infra.net

インタフェース GithubApi


  • public interface GithubApi
    Retriving github data from the network.

    All methods in the class throw RetrofitError when caused Some error.

    関連項目:
    Api Document

      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明

      Create a gist.
      retrofit.client.Response deleteGist(String authorization, String id)
      Delete a gist.
      retrofit.client.Response deleteRepository(String authorization, String owner, String repository)

    • メソッドの詳細

      • createGist

        @POST(value="/gists")
retrofit.client.Response createGist(@Header(value="Authorization")
                                                          String authorization,
                                                          @Body
                                                          GistRequest gistRequest)
        Create a gist.
        パラメータ:
        authorization - The OAuth2 Token.
        gistRequest - The request body.

      • editGist

        @PATCH(value="/gists/{id}")
retrofit.client.Response editGist(@Header(value="Authorization")
                                                              String authorization,
                                                              @Path(value="id")
                                                              String id,
                                                              @Body
                                                              GistRequest gistRequest)
        Edit a gist.
        パラメータ:
        authorization - The OAuth2 Token.
        id - The Gist id.
        gistRequest - The request body.

      • deleteGist

        @DELETE(value="/gists/{id}")
retrofit.client.Response deleteGist(@Header(value="Authorization")
                                                                 String authorization,
                                                                 @Path(value="id")
                                                                 String id)
        Delete a gist.
        パラメータ:
        authorization - The OAuth2 Token.
        id - The gist id.

      • getGist

        @GET(value="/gists/{id}")
GistEntity getGist(@Path(value="id")
                                             String id)
        Get a gist.
        パラメータ:
        id - The gist id.

      • getGistList

        @GET(value="/users/{user}/gists")
List<GistEntity> getGistList(@Header(value="Authorization")
                                                               String authorization,
                                                               @Path(value="user")
                                                               String user)
        Get a list of gist.
        パラメータ:
        authorization - The OAuth2 Token.
        user - The user name.

      • getRepositoryList

        @GET(value="/users/{user}/repos")
List<RepositoryEntity> getRepositoryList(@Path(value="user")
                                                                           String user)

      • deleteRepository

        @DELETE(value="/repos/{owner}/{repo}")
retrofit.client.Response deleteRepository(@Header(value="Authorization")
                                                                                 String authorization,
                                                                                 @Path(value="owner")
                                                                                 String owner,
                                                                                 @Path(value="repo")
                                                                                 String repository)

      • test

        @GET(value="/zukan/search")
List<RepositoryEntity> test()
